articles.title: Discover the all-new MGU9 â€” Now at Echuca MG
articles.author: Annie Barrow
articles.summary: Echuca MG has announced the arrival of its new product, the MGU9. The MGU9 combines striking style, advanced technology, and efficiency. This new car represents a new chapter for MG and Australian drivers.

articles.title: Viral Ninja Luxe CafÃ© Machine lands in Sydney for exclusive three-day tasting event
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Ninja has launched its new Luxe Caf Ã© coffee machine in Australia, priced at $799.99. It combines espresso, cold brew, and filter coffee functions into one sleek unit. The company is also hosting a sensory experience, Ninja Lab, in Sydney and Melbourne to showcase the new machine.

articles.title: 32 Products That'll Stun You With Their Next-Level Results
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil to improve skin texture and elasticity. Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream enriched with Q10 to improve skin's firmness. Mise En Scene released a hair serum containing argan, coconut, olive, and jojoba oils to repair brittle locks. Wet & Forget introduced shower cleaner and exterior spray, a stain-blasting solution for removing mold, mildew, moss, and algae. Kojic Acid Dark Spot Remover Soap utilizes hyaluronic acid, shea butter, vitamin E, and Castile olive oil to hydrate and soothe skin. The Pink Stuff is a miraculous cleaning paste to remove tough messes. Mielle's Rosemary Mint strengthening oil is a biotin-infused formula to help strengthen hair, smooth split ends, and hydrate dry scalps and there is also a Biotin shampoo. Sol de Janerio's Brazilian Bum Bum body cream features guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine to smooth and tighten skin.

articles.title: Unyielding Magnet: Enduring Power on Tank Tracks with Letem svetem Applem Innovation
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Static HyperMount Vacuum Car Mount, a new car phone mount, uses vacuum technology and magnetism for a secure grip. It features a robust build, 360-degree rotation, and can withstand forces up to 30 kg. It also can be used outside of the car, including on bathroom mirrors,kitchen counters,and work desks.

articles.title: The Simple Kirkland Frozen Seafood That Needs To Be In Your Cart
articles.author: Julia Holland
articles.summary: Costco's Kirkland Signature offers a Garlic Butter Shrimp product featuring pre-seasoned shrimp in a butter sauce. Costco customers have shared serving suggestions and cooking tips for the Garlic Butter Shrimp, which can be paired with dishes like udon noodles or fettuccini.

articles.title: Goaltender Spencer Martin Released by CSKA: Latest Updates on NHL Goalie Transfers
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Spencer Martin was released from CSKA Moscow of the KHL, opening potential opportunities in the NHL. Several NHL teams, including the Chicago Blackhawks, San Jose Sharks, Arizona Coyotes, Colorado Avalanche, Edmonton Oilers and New York Rangers are potential destinations for Martin.

articles.title: The Global Beauty Shift: How Innovation Is Making Self-Care More Inclusive
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: TAD Beauty emphasizes comfort, accessibility, and representation in its products. Fenty Beauty's launch in 2017 showcased a well-rounded color palette. L'OrÃ©al and Sephora are leveraging virtual try-on tools, and Dove is developing products that cater to different skin tones and types.

articles.title: Unlock Your Xiaomi Phone's Hidden Secret Menu: A Step-by-Step Guide to Activation
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Xiaomi, Redmi, and POCO phone users gain access to hidden menus through the 'Hidden settings for HyperOS' app, compatible with the HyperOS operating system. This app categorizes settings, unlocking potential features, including advanced camera controls, hardware diagnostics, and network configuration tools.

articles.title: Disclaimer: You Might Become A Bit Obsessed With These 36 Products
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a neck and chest firming cream designed to improve skin firmness and texture. Sol de Janeiro launched Brazilian Bum Bum Cream, a cream with caffeine, guarana extract, and coconut oil. SweatBlock released antiperspirant wipes designed to stop hyperhidrosis and nervous sweating. Mellanni launched cooling bedsheets reviewers are favoring. Bissell introduced multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner.

articles.title: Parents are obsessed with this roomy sleep suit that finally fits kids who actually eat
articles.author: Amber Katz
articles.summary: Love to Dream launched the Original Cotton Long Sleeve Sleep Suit, designed for toddlers. The sleep suit features a roomy design, 100% cotton fabric, footies with ample space, and various TOG ratings for temperature regulation.

Exhibitors are offering price cuts of up to 70% on select products and services.

These products address various cleaning needs in the household, from removing stains and grime to sanitizing surfaces and appliances, offering solutions for kitchens, bathrooms, carpets, and more.

These included small processing machines, electric cars, affordable laptops, advanced engine and gearbox oils from 77 Oils, locally-built food processing machines, and various consumer goods.

The company produces soft drinks under the brand name KZEE and has achieved success by launching the first-ever MRP â‚¹5 club soda in India, using natural ingredients.

articles.title: Just A Mix Of 39 Random Products That Will Make You Go "Oh, I Need That Immediately"
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Maybelline introduces "The Colossal Bubble" Mascara for mega-volume lashes. L'Oreal Paris launches Plump Ambition pH Lip Oil for color-adjusting, plumping, and moisturizing effects. Hawaiian Tropic unveils SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush for scalp protection. Gold Bond releases firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Eos launches Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion. Vlasic launches Pickle Balls flavored puff.

articles.title: Readers reply: How much washing do our clothes really need?
articles.summary: Aerial is recommended for washing clothes. Current washing machines use less power and water and have features such as judging how much wash stuff needs and estimating the weight of the load to adjust the cycle length accordingly.

articles.title: Sell-out beauty calendar contains more than Â£900 worth of products for Â£89
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Avant Skincare has launched its Wonders Advent Calendar for 2025, featuring 12 skincare products valued at Â£935 and sold for Â£99. The calendar includes products like the Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream and Damascan Rose Petals Revitalising Facial Serum, and features an augmented reality experience and the chance to win additional products. It is available with a 10% discount using the code WONDERS.

articles.title: 7 Seemingly Harmless Items That Can Destroy Your Washing Machine
articles.author: Sarah Bourassa
articles.summary: Whirlpool recommends cleaning their washing machines using the 'clean setting' cycle at least once a month or every 30 cycles. Morgan LaLonde, laundry brand manager at Whirlpool, suggests using a mesh garment bag or pillowcase on a cold, gentle cycle when washing shoes in their washing machines to prevent damage.

articles.title: 33 Home Products That'll Make Your Life Easier
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces multiple products, including a WD-40 pen for precise application of lubricant, a KitchenAid stand mixer slider mat for easy movement, and a space-saving ceramic folding griddle with dual temperature zones. Also featured are products such as a makeup organizer and over-the-stove spice rack.

articles.title: Beverage firm excites consumers with new variant
articles.author: Our Reporter
articles.summary: Guinness Nigeria has launched Guinness Smooth, a new variant of stout, at an event in Uyo. Guinness Smooth is described as a refreshing and easy-drinking stout with a fruity and butterscotch flavor, targeting younger consumers. The company highlighted its commitment to innovation and support for local economies.

articles.title: Swepety AI Launches Custom Agentic AI Platform to Accelerate Enterprise Automation
articles.summary: Swepety AI launched its custom agentic AI platform on November 2, 2025, designed to integrate with enterprise infrastructure to automate workflows. The platform offers capabilities such as Intelligent Lead and Revenue Orchestration, Operational Intelligence and Automation, Enterprise Process Automation, and Customer Intelligence and Growth Systems, with pricing starting at $2,500 for proof-of-concept deployments.

articles.title: Limited-time Dyson deal sees customers trade in vacuum for money off brand-new machine
articles.author: Jade Mcelwee
articles.summary: Dyson introduced a limited-time trade-in offer where customers can exchange old Dyson vacuums for a discount on new models, including the Dyson Gen5detect, V12 Detect Slim, and V15 Detect Absolute +. Customers trading in eligible models like Dyson V6 to V11 receive a Â£100 voucher. Dyson is committed to refurbishing or recycling traded-in vacuums.

articles.title: The Buzz About Blue Honey: A Greek Innovation Hopes to Take the World by Storm
articles.author: Tasos Kokkinidis
articles.summary: It's Alive introduces "Blue Honey," a new product created by mixing traditional Greek honey with spirulina extract. The product is set to be exported to the United States, where Laconic Foods will market it exclusively under the brand Cyano.

articles.title: 35 Products To Make You Feel Like A Pro Organizer
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of organizational products designed to improve home storage and tidiness.  These include organizers for makeup, closets, laundry, food containers, drawers, spices, documents, bedding, water bottles, cleaning supplies, shoes, medications, tea bags, jewelry, soda cans, records, K-Cups, pantries, brooms, games, and caps, each offering a specialized solution for specific storage needs.

articles.title: ET Startup Awards 2025: Myntra must become Ã¢Â€Â˜AI-firstÃ¢Â€Â™ to win IndiaÃ¢Â€Â™s 400 million GenZ consumers, says CEO Nandita Sinha
articles.summary: Myntra is developing an AI-led shopping experience for Gen Z consumers, focusing on content-first and trend-first approaches. The company also launched M-Now, an ultra-fast delivery service available in select cities, with daily orders doubling in the last quarter.

articles.title: Demi Moore, Selma Hayek, Cindy Crawfordâ€¦ toutes les looks des stars au gala Art+Film du LACMA

articles.summary: An apparel company is introducing a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company is partnering with an agency to create customer profiles of wealthy, young parents for targeted advertising within partner apps, aiming to promote their new product line to the appropriate demographic.

articles.title: The Man Who Made Nirma A Household Name: Karsanbhai Patel's Journey From Bicycle Sales To Billionaire
articles.author: Edited by:
articles.summary: Karsanbhai Patel created Nirma detergent in 1969, offering it at an affordable price of Rs 13 per kilogram. The product's effectiveness and low cost led to its rapid acceptance, prompting Patel to expand production and eventually include soaps and personal care products.

articles.title: Canva Rolls Out Its Own AI Model and Creative Operating System
articles.summary: Canva has launched its Creative Operating System, featuring a new AI Design Model. The platform update includes features like Video 2.0, Canva Forms, Sheets, and Code, Canva Email Design, AI-Powered Elements and Ask @Canva. This update aims to make visual creation faster, smarter, and more personal, targeting creators, students, and small businesses in Nigeria and globally.

LG releases a 43-inch UA82 Series 4K Ultra HD Smart webOS LED TV featuring the Î±7 Gen8 processor and webOS 25.

articles.title: 20 Things From Amazon That Make Perfect Gifts
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new products and gadgets. It lists from microwave grills to cocktail-themed candles and Kuromi plush headbands, each product caters to specific needs and interests. These products aim to enhance convenience, style, and enjoyment in everyday life.

articles.title: Nissan Tekton Vs Renault Duster â€” Design Comparison Of Upcoming SUVs
articles.summary: Nissan is preparing to launch the Nissan Tekton SUV, featuring a futuristic and urban design with a closed upper grille, C-shaped LED DRLs and a sleeker headlamp layout. Renault is also gearing up to launch the new Renault Duster SUV, retaining a traditional SUV stance with a high bonnet line, large grille, split LED headlamps and pronounced wheel arches.

articles.title: The 'brilliant' Ninja 8 in 1 machine that's 'worth every penny'
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Foodi 8-Mode 6L PossibleCooker Rice & Slow Cooker, a multicooker with eight functions, available at multiple retailers. SAGE offers the Fast Slow GOâ„¢ multicooker with 14 settings, and Lakeland sells the Instant Pot Duo Plus WhisperQuiet 5.7L Multi Cooker, a nine-in-one appliance.

articles.title: Neo humanoid robot unveiled to handle home chores
articles.summary: 1X Technologies unveiled Neo, a new humanoid robot designed to handle home chores. The unveiling was reported on November 2, 2025.

articles.title: Palo Alto company unveils new humanoid robot, claims it can aid with automated household chores
articles.author: JERUSALEM POST STAFF
articles.summary: 1X Technologies has launched the Neo robot, the first 'consumer available humanoid robot'. Neo is specialized in performing house chores.

articles.title: Fentasy.se Unveils 2025 Dress Collection Redefining Modern Scandinavian Elegance
articles.summary: Fentasy.se, a Swedish online fashion retailer, has launched its 2025 dress collection, which embodies Scandinavian grace and modern sophistication. The new line includes party, floral, white, pink, and maxi dresses, all crafted with premium fabrics. The collection highlights the brand's mission to provide high-quality design accessible to every woman, emphasizing comfort and balance.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 global launch set for November 13
articles.author: Technobaboy
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 globally on November 13, featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, a 6.78-inch 165Hz screen, a 7,300mAh battery with 120W charging, and OPPO's Lumo Imaging System for the camera. The phone will ship with Android 16 and OxygenOS, offering color options like Sand Storm, black, and purple.

articles.title: Top 9 Rain Jackets to Consider in 2025: Affordable, Eco-Friendly, Hiking, and Running Options
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The article introduces top rain jackets to consider in 2025, encompassing a range of options from affordable choices like the Columbia Watertight II Jacket to high-performance options like the Arc'teryx Beta AR Jacket. Other featured brands and models include Patagonia Torrentshell 3L, Outdoor Research Helium Rain Jacket, REI Co-op Rainier Rain Jacket, The North Face Dryzzle FUTURELIGHT Jacket, Marmot PreCip Eco Jacket and Lululemon Rain Rebel Jacket, each catering to diverse needs such as hiking, running, and everyday wear.

articles.title: How to Buy Her a Sex Toy
articles.author: Danielle Page
articles.summary: The article features an introduction to a variety of sex toys and accessories from companies like Dame, Womanizer, We-Vibe, Adam & Eve, plusOne, Satisfyer, Lovehoney, Lovense, UpkoUsa, Pjur, Epiphany, and The Pelvic People. These products range from couples vibrators like Dame Eva II and We-Vibe Sync O, to masturbation toys like the Womanizer Next and Satisfyer Pro 2, and accessories such as Pjur Analyse Me! Relaxing Lube and Epiphany Clit Arousal Serum. The Kiwi from the Pelvic People is also introduced as a product designed to help with penetration pain.

articles.title: New Era Announces 2025 Major League Baseball World Series Champions Collection Celebrating the Los Angeles Dodgers
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: New Era, the Official Cap of Major League Baseball (MLB), has unveiled its 2025 World Series Champions Collection. This collection celebrates the Los Angeles Dodgers' victory.

articles.title: Hailey Bieber trolled for â€˜robotic' awards speech, ChatGPT language
articles.author: Team Indulge
articles.summary: Hailey Bieber, founder of Rhode Skin, received the Beauty Innovator Award and discussed her vision for Rhode Skin as a beauty brand focused on product quality and community. She emphasized creating a brand without boundaries and celebrated other founders in the beauty industry.
